availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Drury C. Young (Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Nancy Young. Married to Martha J. Sigler Young. Father of Josephine Young, Nannie Young, John Young, and William Young. Farmer in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Princeton in 1860. Employed William Wyatt as a farmhand in Princeton in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 347A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 74.
"Drury Carol Young (1828-1877)," Find A Grave, Memorial #11473080, accessed December 21, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/11473080.
